title.rendered: TOPPING OUT CEREMONY OF SORA GARDEN SC BY NEWTECONS

content.rendered:
[Ho Chi Minh City, December 1, 2022] The SORA Gardens SC project’s topping out ceremony was held by Newtecons with the assistance of Investor Becamex Tokyu. Representatives from several organizations, including the leaders of the province of Binh Duong, Becamex IDC, AEON Vietnam, AEON FANTASY VIETNAM, Apave, Artelia, SWA, Plantec, 9PMP Vietnam, Site Management Team, contractors, and subcontractors, attended the ceremony.

Speaking on behalf of Becamex Tokyu, Mr. Oh Dongkun said: “Today we celebrate the topping out celebration, a significant milestone for the SORA gardens SC project. For maintaining the site’s record of safe construction with more than 500,000 hours of safety, I would like to convey my sincere gratitude to Newtecons contractor. I want to emphasize to the contractor that they should keep putting safety first and keeping the project on track. We are close to our dream SORA Gardens SC. We are confident that this project would considerably improve living conditions in Binh Duong City and offer great joy to all locals”.

The local government, Becamex Tokyu Investor, and partners were thanked by Mr. Tran Kim Long, Chairman of Newtecons Board of Directors, for fostering favorable conditions that allowed Newtecons to carry out the project and proceed with the project topping-out on schedule. “SORA Gardens SC was constructed during a period when the construction sector, particularly the overall economy, was struggling. Significant effects include spikes in raw material prices, a labor shortage, banks’ tightening of credit policies, modifications to legislation governing fire prevention and fighting, etc. Despite these obstacles, the topping ceremony still took place at the scheduled time. This is a significant milestone to mark the completion of the first difficult part of the journey and also demonstrates the enthusiasm of the Newtecons engineering team who have worked tirelessly day and night to bring success to the project”, said Mr. Long.

The SORA gardens SC project was quickly put into operation beginning in March 2022 by Newtecons as the General Contractor under the strict supervision of the Investor. Construction management, environmental sanitation, and safety are always prioritized and definitely guaranteed; office work, including record administration, is carried out carefully and systematically.

“Site Management Team carefully planned people resources, supplies, and equipment while promptly preparing and implementing proper construction plans. We are always highly focused, united, working day and night to complete the huge workload and urgent timeline.” Mr. Le Van Manh, Construction Site Manager, shared at the event.

The project is expected to be completed by the end of the first quarter of 2023, the Site Management Team has made numerous preparations to meet the tight construction deadline while maintaining the highest level in accordance with strict Japan technical standards.

Những ngày cuối năm, mặc dù gặp rất nhiều khó khăn do biến động của thị trường, nhịp làm việc trên công trường dự án SORA gardens SC tất bật, tinh thần làm việc hăng say kể cả ngoài công trường và tại văn phòng dự án. Không khí làm việc luôn khẩn trương, sôi nổi nhưng không thiếu những nụ cười lạc quan, tin tưởng.


Dự án gồm 4 tầng với tổng diện tích sàn xây dựng 19.863m2. Sau khi hoàn thiện, SORA gardens SC sẽ trở thành khu phức hợp thương mại đầu tiên và lớn nhất Thành phố mới Bình Dương, bao gồm: Siêu thị, khu mua sắm, khu vui chơi giải trí, khu ẩm thực, rạp chiếu phim, khuôn viên cây xanh với cảnh quang bắt mắt. Đây là dự án thứ 2 sau sự hợp tác thành công giữa Newtecons và Becamex Tokyu tại dự án Sora Gardens II.
